description.value: Whether secrets, gold, or another specific type of items, you take pleasure in building your collections. Having developed a keen sense for these particular types of items, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Perception checks to locate treasure, hidden objects, or secret doors.

source.value: If you are an investigator, this ability allows 'That's Odd' to activate one additional time within a room to discover a potential object for your given collection of items.
